description: Lasagne made easy. This five-ingredient recipe offers a simple way to make lasagne a weeknight-friendly meal the family will love.
keywords: Lasagne,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Mince,Sesame free,Beef
name: Traditional FamilyFriendly Lasagne Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 505g Dolmio Extra Bolognese tomato pasta sauce

HowToTip.tipText: Make sure that you choose lasagne sheets that don’t need pre-cooking (most varieties sold are ready-to-use).

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C (fan 180°C). Heat a large frying pan and add the mince, cook over a high heat, stirring well until browned and cooked through.
Tip in the Dolmio Extra Bolognese Tomato Pasta Sauce, stir and simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from the heat.

HowToTip.tipText: Make sure that you choose lasagne sheets that don’t need pre-cooking (most varieties sold are ready-to-use).

recipeInstructions.text: Tip half the mixture into a large rectangular baking dish measuring about 26 cm x 20 cm. Arrange 3 lasagne sheets on top, then spread half the Dolmio Bechamel Lasagne Sauce over them. Repeat the layers, then sprinkle the grated cheese evenly over the surface.

HowToTip.tipText: For a vegetarian alternative, use a vegetarian alternative mince instead of beef. If you want a change from red meat, substitute the beef with pork mince or turkey mince.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for around 30 minutes, until cooked and golden brown. Allow to stand for a few minutes, then serve.
